name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Exploring the fundamentals of aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Examining forces acting on bodies in fluid flow.

lessons.name: Boundary Layers
lessons.description: Understanding the boundary layer concept and its effects on aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: The characteristics of subsonic flows and their implications on design.

lessons.name: Supersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: The behavior of supersonic flows, including shock waves and expansion fans.

lessons.name: Transonic Flight
lessons.description: Challenges and phenomena associated with transonic speeds.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Analysis
lessons.description: Techniques for thermal analysis in high-speed flows.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Fluid Flow
lessons.description: Understanding convective heat transfer in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Materials
lessons.description: Materials used for thermal protection in aerospace applications.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Material Properties for Space
lessons.description: Examining material properties critical for space applications.

lessons.name: Stress Analysis in Structures
lessons.description: Techniques for analyzing stresses within spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Thermal Effects on Materials
lessons.description: Understanding the impact of thermal stresses on spacecraft materials.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws and Orbits
lessons.description: Exploring Kepler's laws and their application to orbital mechanics.

lessons.name: Orbit Transfers and Maneuvers
lessons.description: Understanding different types of orbit transfers and maneuvers.

lessons.name: Interplanetary Trajectories
lessons.description: Planning and navigating interplanetary missions.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Design Principles
lessons.description: Core principles and methodologies in spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Power Systems in Spacecraft
lessons.description: Design and management of spacecraft power systems.

lessons.name: Communication Systems for Space
lessons.description: Technologies and strategies for space communication systems.
